description: Samuel O'Toole and Johnny Torque are engaged in a form of War Games. Primary objective: soak the enemy and gain the upper hand. Secondary objective: blow jobs for everyone after the enemy is defeated. Full disclosure: neither one of them are very good soldiers, but they're both pretty awesome at the blow job part. Stay to end to see these guys unload a full round, as they take no prisoners in this no holes barred affair.  Enjoy!
title: Lock, Stock And 2 Smoking Cocks
